questions.question: Which plane divides the body into anterior and posterior parts?
questions.explanation: The frontal (coronal) plane divides the body into anterior (front) and posterior (back) parts.

questions.question: What does 'superior' mean in anatomical directional terms?
questions.explanation: Superior means above or higher in position, while inferior means below or lower in position.

questions.question: The study of tissues is called:
questions.explanation: Histology is the study of tissues. Cytology studies cells, pathology studies disease, and embryology studies development.

questions.question: Which term describes the palm side of the hand?
questions.explanation: Palmar refers to the palm side of the hand, while dorsal refers to the back of the hand. Plantar refers to the sole of the foot.

questions.question: The basic structural and functional unit of life is:
questions.explanation: The cell is the basic structural and functional unit of all living organisms.
